adviseScripts.text: Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Pray tell,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: what dost thou believe is the reason behind my inability to best Dorothy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I believe it's due to a difference in experience.
I believe it's due to a difference in skills.
Oh ho!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: A most salient point, My Lord.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: But even so...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I shan't readily falter this way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I shall one day surpass Dorothy in every conceivable metric, experience included.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: A disparity in skills, thou sayest?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Henceforth, I shall embark upon my training with a vigor increased tenfold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: With an unwavering  determination, Scarlet presses on with her training until the sun stands high in the sky.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Scarlet is meditating with her eyes closed.
Wave your hand in front of her face.
Throw a small branch at her.
*Swish swish*
Forsooth, what skylarking dost thou engage in?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Cease thy antics, for it disturbs my contemplation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: *Tap*
Pssh.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Didst thou truly reckon such tomfoolery would escape my notice?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Have another go, I insist.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: My mind's eye is all-seeing. I can catch anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I spend a somewhat noisy meditation session together.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Prithee,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: when will thou allow an official duel between Lilith and I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: If I were to permit that, harm would befall you.
Why don't you go ask her yourself?
... Thou dost not mince words.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: However, the length and brevity of the matter shall only be revealed when the clash unfolds.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: And I have been far from languorous with my training.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Dost thou not think there's at least an infinitesimal chance of me securing victory?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have returned henceforth from just positing this inquiry to her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: She informed me that she required your permission.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: And you tell me I must go and ask her again?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: ... Very well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I shall comply.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: That day, Scarlet's request for a duel was turned down by Lilith numerous times.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Why doth Red Hood love meddling in the affairs of others?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: She perambulates tirelessly, putting her finger in every pie,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: yet shows no hint of weariness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Is it because she's my daughter?
It's just her nature.
Verily, thou dost speak the truth?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I harbored suspicions, aye, but dared not conceive it to be true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Finally, her penchant for meddling makes sense.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I was just joking...
Hath her nature been thus from the outset?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Most intriguing...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I'm afraid I don't have anyone in my immediate circle who shares such predilections.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Oh.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Methinks I am talking with one this very moment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet continues to voice her grievances about Red Hood for a while.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Rapunzel always has that book around her without cease.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Its contents still elude me, but whenever she gazes upon its pages, merriment always fill her heart.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Dost thou have any idea why this is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Of course, I do.
I'm not sure. You should ask her.
*Swish*
Oh, is this the book in question?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Could thou show me, perchance?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Oh my...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I had no clue this martial arts style even existed. How fascinating.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have already done so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: She flushed crimson and hastily departed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: From the fleeting glimpse I did manage to catch,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: the content seemed to pertain to some kind of physical martial arts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I had no idea Rapunzel had an interest in such matters.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet thinks about searching for books on the "martial arts".
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
*Pour*
Would thou care to have some?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It's floral tea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Thanks, I'd love a cup.
When did you decide to share the same hobby as Dorothy?
I personally roasted and brewed this tea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: The aroma and taste are positively opulent,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: quite distinct from whatever Dorothy fancies in her cup.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What poppycock!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: This is no hobby.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: This is but a pursuit in maintaining good health.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Besides, the tea that Dorothy brews is sorely lacking in terms of flavor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: One must properly roast and steep the tea leaves for a greater depth of flavor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet returns to her room and roasts the dried flowers she gathered.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
When mine eyes set upon Snow White,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: there are times when I see myself in her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Because she's stubborn?
Because of her youth?
... Her stubborn side, you say.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: When it comes to stubbornness, aren't there other members who are worse?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: From my understanding, Dorothy, Red Hood, and Lilith are pretty stubborn too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: ... Yes, thou speakest the truth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: There was a time when I too was young.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Those days, however, are long gone...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: That evening, Scarlet stayed up all night thinking of her sister.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
In the art of angling,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: what virtue dost thou deem most important?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Patience.
A sturdy fishing rod.
Aye, thou hast hit the mark straightaway! 'Tis a marvel, indeed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It's good to have you back.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: That is of nugatory importance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: There exist a saying that for a master, the tools matter not.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: With steadfast resolve, even the thinnest of twigs may transform into a mighty fishing rod.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Ruminate upon it further, my friend, and give me another answer later.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: On her way back, Scarlet catches a big fish.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
The Goddess Squad is quite a curio.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: A motley group of individuals, each adorned with unique personalities and appearances.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: And yet, there is a remarkable sense of bonhomie amongst everyone here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: You talk as if you're not part of the squad yourself.
Could it be because you have a trustworthy leader?
I do realize that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Nevertheless...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I daresay, I haven't quite woven myself seamlessly into the squad just yet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yes... that's how I feel...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Ah, you are speaking of Lilith.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: She is indeed a trustworthy individual.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: ... Hmm?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Pray tell, why dost thou bear such a discontented visage?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: As Scarlet heads back to her room, she still cannot process the fact that she is truly part of the Goddess Squad.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Do tell, are you proficient at organizing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, I think I’m pretty good at it.
No, I'm not.
... Truly?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I do not recall thy immediate purlieu in a particularly pristine disposition.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Then again,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: everyone has their own standards.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: You very well may hold yourself to your own.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Just as well, I say.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I fail to see the necessity for
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: unending organization on a daily basis.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Should thou be able to locate what one needs when one needs it, what more can one desire?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I simply cannot comprehend it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet pretends not to hear Dorothy and Lilith telling her to organize her room.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Scarlet gazes at the roses blooming in the field.
Don't you think the roses are beautiful?
Do you fancy one? Shall I pluck one for you?
Dost thou feel similarly?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Mine own thoughts mirror thine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Truly, their beauty is rapturous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: 'Tis enough to bring a tear to one's eyes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Absolutely not.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Dost thou grasp the folly of thy actions? 'Tis a terrible thing to mar a flower so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Flowers are at the apogee of their beauty when thou simply observe them quietly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet continues to gaze at the roses for a while.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Many a soul chooses to imbibe grog for
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: its calming effects on the mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Pray tell, dost thou revel in the joy of drink?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I can't even get a good night's sleep without a nighttime drink.
I don't understand the appeal spirits have for some people.
Forsooth!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I did not realize you were so partial to spirits.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Thou and I share the same thoughts on this matter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I cannot fathom why some people choose to
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: indulge in spirits to such a degree.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet fondly recalls the scent of the rose-infused liquor she used to enjoy.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Lilith does not merely vanquish Raptures.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: She tears them limb from limb.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I long to tear apart a Rapture...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: ... I don't think it's possible for you.
You can do it!
Hah, what tomfoolery! Jumping to conclusion when I've not even finished my piece.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Mark my words, My Lord. The day will soon come to pass when I tear a Rapture asunder.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: The mere act of your skepticism riles up my competitive spirit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I shan't feel the slightest trace of sincerity in your cheer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet renewed her determination to become as strong as Lilith.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
I require a partner for my training this day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Will thou lend me a hand?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: All I require is for thee to hold the object which I will be slicing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What if you cut me by accident?
Oh boy!
How dare thou!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What manner of a fool dost thou take me for?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have never injured anyone unless I meant to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What kind of reaction is that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I'm so excited to get an opportunity to see you train up close.
I certainly did not expect thee to be in such a state of near ecstasy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Very well, let's train.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet trains with a bit more concentration than usual.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Snow White and Lilith are akin to two peas in a pod.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Some people even mistake them for sisters.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: ... That must be nice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What about having a brother instead?
Why don't you ask if you can join them?
... I presume thou are referring to thee and I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Thank thee, but I must decline.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I would much prefer to have a sister.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: If such a thing were truly feasible...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Oh, how wondrous it would be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet closes her eyes and thinks of a certain someone.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
Pray tell,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: dost thou believe I am strong?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yeah.
Yes, but not as strong as me.
Thine answer came with nary a hesitation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Because your strength is so formidable.
Is that so... well, many thanks for thy candor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Hmm?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Dost thou speak the truth, verily?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Such is my shock, that I am at a loss for words.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet ponders different ways in which she can become even stronger.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
I held counsel with Rapunzel today about the joy of using one's body.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: So... were you able to have a civil conversation about that?
What did you talk about?
I never anticipated finding myself in such a conversation with Rapunzel.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: However, she is more adept in the delight of using the corporeal form than I had envisaged.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Most indubitably, I was rather taken aback.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Our conversation spanned numerous topics.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: How thou can use thy body to feel good,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: and how to use it more aptly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It was indeed a rare moment to partake in such an enlightening conversation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet recalls her talk with Rapunzel.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
I have but a question for thee.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Dost thou consider us close?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Of course, we're family.
Our relationship is mostly professional, don't you think?
... Family, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Not bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: ... Is that truly so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: ... I'm just kidding.
Honestly, it was all just a joke.
... Very well, I understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet takes some time to mull over her various interpersonal relationships.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
When thou pines for someone,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: what course of action dost thou pursue?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: The only thing I can do is miss them.
I'll cry.
Verily, thou dost not flee from the emotions thou feel when missing that person?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: No. This way, the pain of missing them will lessen with time.
... I see. That makes sense.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Cry? Whatever for?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: If you cry yourself to sleep, then you can forget about how much it hurts missing them.
... I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: But I shan't wish to shed tears.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet falls into a state of contemplation.
Scarlet closes her eyes and recalls the past, which has become a blur.
If thou were to cast off this mortal coil tomorrow's eve,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: what would thou do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I would spend time with the people that are precious to me.
I would spend some quiet time alone.
Verily, nothing holds a greater meaning than this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Aye, that thought did grace my mind as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I would spend my time telling them all the things I have kept inside me for so long.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: To be lone in one's final moments... would that not be a most forlorn demise?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Were it me, I'd revel in the company of those dear to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet seems to be preoccupied with mortality.
